remarks: The orthocomplement of a nonzero singleton is a hyperplane. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dochsnshp.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochsnshp.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsnshp.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsnshp.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochsnshp.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochsnshp.y $e |- Y = ( LSHyp ` U ) $.
dochsnshp.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochsnshp.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
dochsnshp $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` { X } ) e. Y ) $.
